level.text: The USOA, as prescribed in §2402, may be revised by petition of an interested party or by motion of the Commission; Provided, that the revisions to the USOA shall not take effect until the Commission orders the revisions to take effect and compliance with D.C. Code §1-1506 (1981 Ed.), is effected.

The USOA, as prescribed in §2402.1, shall not include §3216 of 47 CFR Part 32, regarding the automatic adoption of changes in the Generally Accepted Accounting Principles upon ninety (90) days’ notice of the telephone corporation to the Commission.
